summary: I got fed up with not being able to find a good Horker mod for Skyrim so I decided to make one. He can be found in Solitude, near the Bard\'s College. He is prone to doing kinky things including yerking off in public. This isn\'t that same as Robbaz\' but it was as close as I could get. Still I hope you enjoy. Send a message my way if you encounter
descriptionHtml:
I got fed up with not being able to find a good Horker mod for Skyrim so I decided to make one. He can be found in Solitude, near the Bard\'s College. He is prone to doing kinky things including yerking off in public. This isn\'t that same as Robbaz\' but it was as close as I could get. Still I hope you enjoy. Send a message my way if you encounter any bugs and I\'ll try to take a look at it.
Cheers.

Update History:
v1.0: Mod released. Three commands: Follow, Stay and Go home.

v1.1: Reenabled the ability to go inside/through doors. *Side note* Not my problem if things fly off tables etc.
author: Sacrim0
